div.p: This is a quick test script
Which is a dirty lunch-time hack
to demonstrate how to do burn-in captions in Microsoft Expression Encoder
The rest of the captions are just random text,
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Vivamus porttitor odio at ligula consectetur a dictum nulla tempus...
Pellentesque eu felis quis ipsum lacinia rutrum
Nunc pretium tincidunt magna, ac interdum purus aliquam dapibus
Praesent porta iaculis mi, id molestie diam feugiat at
Nunc pharetra lorem et nulla porta eget condimentum eros faucibus
Maecenas semper lacus lacinia velit adipiscing nec lobortis libero accumsan
Suspendisse aliquam risus eu ipsum viverra pulvinar
